specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Dye Method: Pigment Dye Pigment dye applies color to the fabric surface without penetrating the fibers, creating a vintage, faded look. It offers a soft, unique appearance but may fade more easily with washing.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric. Dye Method > Pigment Dye Pigment dyed fabrics are intended to fade and alter in color gradually over time. so it requires special care in handling.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use Sweatshirts
